name: Figma Customer Onboarding
description:
Hello. I am a Product Designer at LaSoft - software developing company. We work with worldwide customers and make design for products.

I was wondering how to collaborate in the Figma tool between team and the customer. Goal was to let the customer move to this collaboration tool painless. I decided to create simple screen with GIFs. 

Feel free to share with your customers to make collaboration clear and easy.
